SELECT si.id, si.name, si.type, si.type_id AS typeId, si.amount, si.unit, si.content, si.price, si.stock_id, si.create_date AS createDate, ct.`name` AS consumableType, shi.name AS stockName FROM stock_goods_info si LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = si.type_id ) LEFT JOIN storehouse_info shi ON ( shi.id = si.stock_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockGoodsInfo.name},'%')
AND si.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockGoodsInfo.type},'%')
AND si.type_id = #{stockGoodsInfo.typeId}
AND si.is_in = 0 ORDER BY si.create_date DESC

SELECT si.id, si.name, si.type, si.type_id AS typeId, si.amount, si.unit, si.content, si.price, si.create_date AS createDate, ct.`name` AS consumableType FROM stock_goods_info si LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = si.type_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stockGoodsInfo.name},'%')

AND si.type_id = #{stockGoodsInfo.typeId}
AND si.is_in = 0

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL( SUM(er.amount), 0 ) AS amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN stock_goods_info er ON ( DATE_FORMAT( er.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AND er.is_in = 1 GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
SELECT IFNULL(sum( si.amount * si.price ),0) AS price, ct.`name` FROM stock_goods_info si LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = si.type_id ) WHERE si.is_in = 1 GROUP BY ct.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL( SUM(er.amount), 0 ) AS amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN stock_goods_info er ON ( DATE_FORMAT( er.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AND er.is_in = 2 GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
SELECT IFNULL(sum( si.amount * si.price ),0) AS price, ct.`name` FROM stock_goods_info si LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = si.type_id ) WHERE si.is_in = 2 GROUP BY ct.id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS putCount FROM stock_goods_info si WHERE si.is_in = 1 ) AS on1, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS outCount FROM stock_goods_info si WHERE si.is_in = 2 ) AS on2, ( SELECT IFNULL( SUM( si.amount * si.price ),0) AS price FROM stock_goods_info si WHERE si.is_in = 1 ) AS on3
